title._content: Image taken from page 145 of 'The Life and Adventures of Robinson Crusoe ... With a portrait, and one hundred illustrations by J. D. Watson, engraved on wood by the brothers Dalziel. [Part two is abridged.]'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Life and Adventures of Robinson Crusoe ... With a portrait, and one hundred illustrations by J. D. Watson, engraved on wood by the brothers Dalziel. [Part two is abridged.]", "Major Single Works. Robinson Crusoe. Parts I, II" Author: Defoe, Daniel Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 12604.i.10." Page: 145 Place of Publishing: London, New York Date of Publishing: 1883 Publisher: George Routledge & Sons Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000892273 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
